backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a fix for keeping the Valentine 'No' button fully within the viewport.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend paths to their descriptive summaries for quick reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with light/dark OKLCH color variables and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Controls screen state transitions between opening, transition, and celebration views.
frontend/src/components/valentine/consta: Provides static text, emoji sets, and message arrays for the Valentine UI screens.
frontend/src/components/valentine/FinalC: Renders final celebration UI with floating hearts, teddy bear GIF, emoji row, and optional music playback.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Firewo: Canvas component rendering animated pink fireworks with burst rings and particle effects.
frontend/src/components/valentine/NoButt: Repositions the 'No' button randomly while strictly clamping it inside the visible viewport with visualViewport support.
frontend/src/components/valentine/Openin: Opening screen with name, question, Yes/No buttons, and auto-cycling 'No' messages after first click.
frontend/src/components/valentine/PopHea: Renders floating pop-in hearts that spawn at random positions with timed lifetimes and a cap on simultaneous hearts.
frontend/src/components/valentine/YesTra: Displays a fade-to-black transition and triggers fireworks before calling a completion callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing for this frontend-only project.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, Valentine-themed color variables, fonts, and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements, including fixing the off-screen 'No' button bug.
